forager.domain

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • forager.domain.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    A node class containing information about a tile.

      int getEnergyCost()
      Returns energy cost.
      MyArrayList<Line> getNeighbors()
      Returns the list of best routes to neighbors defined as processed for this tile by PhasedForager.

      Returns cost spent or gained while reaching a special tile for the first time.

      Returns the index number of the tile on the dungeon's list of special tiles.

      Returns the amount of time spent while moving into this tile.

            int y,
            int energyCost,
            int specialCost)
        Creates a new tile.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        energyCost - amount of energy spent while moving to this tile
        specialCost - amount of energy spent or gained when reaching this tile for the first time

        timeCost - amount of time spent moving to this tile

      • getSpecialCost

        public int getSpecialCost()
        Returns cost spent or gained while reaching a special tile for the first time.
        Returns:
        special cost. 0 means the tile is not a special tile.
